Workflow.Name: Trámites a Distancia - Carga Datos Adicionales
Workflow.Outputs: {"schema":{"properties":{"fileFullName":{"default":"","description":"Ruta de descarga del borrador de la declaración jurada","format":null,"title":"fileFullName","type":"string","value":null}},"type":"object"}}
Workflow.Definition:
"@INPUT valorTotalMercaderia : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'valorTotalMercaderia', 'DefaultValue': '1000', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT observacionesNroFactura : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'observacionesNroFactura', 'DefaultValue': 'Nro Factura: 1111', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT expedientesEscalonados : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'expedientesEscalonados', 'DefaultValue': 'No', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT fechaNotificacion : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'fechaNotificacion', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT prorroga : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'prorroga', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT prorrogaExtraordinaria : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'prorrogaExtraordinaria', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT proveedor : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'proveedor', 'DefaultValue': 'Cualquier cosa', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT ConfigMailPath : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'ConfigMailPath', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\AppMineria\\Config\\Configmail Carga de Mineria.xlsx', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT EmailFrom : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'EmailFrom', 'DefaultValue': 'mjoeok@gmail.com', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT rutaDeclaracionJurada : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'rutaDeclaracionJurada', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\Users\\Karina Gabanzo\\Documents\\Proyectos\\Interlog\\Input\\Factura 721556\\RE', 'Type': 'String' } 
@OUTPUT fileFullName : { 'Description': 'Ruta de descarga del borrador de la declaración jurada', 'FriendlyName': 'fileFullName' } 
WebAutomation.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> browser
BLOCK IngresarDatosAdicionales
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 4
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
END
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Valor Total Mercaderia']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Valor Total Mercaderia']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Valor Total Mercaderia'] Text: valorTotalMercaderia EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Valor Total Mercaderia']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Valor Total Mercaderia']
 MouseAndKeyboard.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Expedientes Escalonados']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Expedientes Escalonados']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Expedientes Escalonados'] Text: expedientesEscalonados EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 IF expedientesEscalonados = $'''Si''' THEN
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Fecha Notificación']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Fecha Notificación']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Fecha Notificación'] Text: fechaNotificacion EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Fecha Notificación']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Fecha Notificación']
 MouseAndKeyboard.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga'] Text: prorroga EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga Extraordinaria']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga Extraordinaria']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Combobox Prórroga Extraordinaria'] Text: prorrogaExtraordinaria EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 END
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Proveedor']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Proveedor']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Proveedor'] Text: proveedor EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Campo Observaciones']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Campo Observaciones'] Text: observacionesNroFactura EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Campo Observaciones']
 MouseAndKeyboard.Click ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftClick MillisecondsDelay: 0
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Guardar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Guardar']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Guardar']
 MouseAndKeyboard.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 MouseAndKeyboard.MoveMouse X: 1400 Y: 700 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT 30
 # ---------------------------------- // Declaración Jurada Generada // ----------------------------------
 DISABLE CALL Guardar_Expediente
END
FUNCTION Enviar_Mail GLOBAL
 CALL Extraer_ConfigMail
 LOOP FOREACH EmailCurrentData IN ConfigMail
 IF EmailCurrentData['ID'] = EmailIndex THEN
 Email.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: EmailFrom Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: EmailFrom SenderDisplayName: $'''RPA_Minería''' SendTo: EmailCurrentData['To'] Subject: EmailCurrentData['Subject'] Body: EmailCurrentData['Body'] IsBodyHtml: False
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_ConfigMail GLOBAL
 Excel.LaunchAndOpen Path: ConfigMailPath Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> ExcelInstance
 Excel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstance StartColumn: 1 StartRow: 1 EndColumn: 4 EndRow: 4 ReadAsText: True FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> ConfigMail
 Excel.Close Instance: ExcelInstance
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Guardar_Expediente GLOBAL
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']) FOR 200
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Ventana \"Save As\"']) FOR 60
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo']) FOR 60
 UIAutomation.DataExtraction.GetElementDetails Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo'] AttributeName: $'''Own Text''' AttributeValue=> fileName
 WAIT 1
 Text.Replace Text: rutaDeclaracionJurada TextToFind: $'''RE''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: fileName ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> fileFullName
 UIAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField TextField: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo'] Text: fileFullName Mode: UIAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace ClickType: UIAutomation.PopulateMouseClickType.SingleClick
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Botón Guardar']) FOR 60
 UIAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton Button: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Botón Guardar']
END FUNCTION"

LocalizedName.description: Trámites a Distancia - Carga Datos Adicionales

Workflow.Name: CARGA DE CERTIFICADOS MINEROS
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: [otrosClientesPassword]
@INPUT configFilePath : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'configFilePath', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\AppMineria\\Config\\Config.xlsx', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT otrosClientesCUITCUIL : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'otrosClientesCUITCUIL', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '' } 
@INPUT otrosClientesPassword : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'otrosClientesPassword', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '' } 
CALL Leer_ConfigFile
Folder.GetSubfolders Folder: configData['rutaInputs'] FolderFilter: configData['filtroCarpetas'] IncludeSubfolders: False FailOnAccessDenied: True SortBy1: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending1: False SortBy2: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending2: False SortBy3: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending3: False Subfolders=> foldersInput
LOOP FOREACH folder IN foldersInput
 Folder.GetFiles Folder: folder FileFilter: $'''*.xlsx;*.xlsm''' IncludeSubfolders: False FailOnAccessDenied: True SortBy1: Folder.SortBy.RootPath SortDescending1: False SortBy2: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending2: False SortBy3: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending3: False Files=> inputFile
 Text.Replace Text: configData['rutaDeclaracionJurada'] TextToFind: $'''xxxx''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: folder.Name ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> rutaDeclaracionJurada
 Text.Replace Text: configData['cuerpoMailFinalización'] TextToFind: $'''xxxx''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: folder.Name ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> cuerpoMail
 SET inputFileName TO inputFile[0].FullName
 CALL Extraer_Datos_ClienteGenerales
 CALL Extraer_Datos_ItemsMercaderia
 CALL Web_IniciarSesion
 BLOCK ErrorCargarDatosGenerales
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET reintentos TO reintentos + 1
 CALL Web_CerrarSesion
 CALL Web_IniciarSesion
 REPEAT ACTION
END
 CALL Ingresar_Datos_Generales
 END
 SET reintentos TO 0
 SET itemsCounter TO 0
 SET itemsLimit TO 1
 SET valorTotalMercaderia TO 0
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> chromeInstance
 Variables.CreateNewList List=> listadoArchivosProcesados
 BLOCK ErrorCargarDatosItems
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 5
 CALL Enviar_Mail_Error
 CALL Web_CerrarSesion
END
 LOOP FOREACH currentItem IN inputItemData
 CALL Ingresar_Datos_Item
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: itemsCounter IncrementValue: 1
 END
 CALL Ingresar_Datos_Adicionales
 # ----------------------------------- // Guardar Expediente // -----------------------------------
 BLOCK Error_Guardar_Expediente
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET reintentos TO reintentos + 1
 CALL Recuperar_Tramite
 REPEAT ACTION
END
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Guardar Expediente'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '4bb7e8b5-03a1-4f66-8c8f-53c8876306a3' @rutaDeclaracionJurada: rutaDeclaracionJurada @fileFullName=> rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 END
 SET reintentos TO 0
 # ----------------------------------- // Obtener Adjuntos // -----------------------------------
 Folder.GetFiles Folder: folder FileFilter: $'''*.pdf''' IncludeSubfolders: False FailOnAccessDenied: True SortBy1: Folder.SortBy.RootPath SortDescending1: False SortBy2: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending2: False SortBy3: Folder.SortBy.NoSort SortDescending3: False Files=> filesToUpload
 LOOP FOREACH pdfFiles IN filesToUpload
 SET pdfFileName TO pdfFiles.Name
 IF Contains(pdfFileName, $'''FACTURA''', True) THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Reportes Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'd24ffa1d-5896-4cfc-904b-ecdff5748bf8' @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @rutaFactura: pdfFiles.FullName @rutaNotaFabricante: $'''''' @contadorPosicion: 1 @cargarFactura: $'''True'''
 ELSE IF Contains(pdfFileName, $'''DDJJ''', True) THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Reportes Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'd24ffa1d-5896-4cfc-904b-ecdff5748bf8' @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @rutaFactura: $'''''' @rutaNotaFabricante: pdfFiles.FullName @contadorPosicion: 1 @cargarFactura: $'''False'''
 ELSE IF Contains(pdfFileName, $'''Art 32''', True) THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Reportes Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'd24ffa1d-5896-4cfc-904b-ecdff5748bf8' @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @rutaFactura: $'''''' @rutaNotaFabricante: pdfFiles.FullName @contadorPosicion: 1 @cargarFactura: $'''False'''
 ELSE IF Contains(pdfFileName, $'''Documentos''', False) THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Reportes Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'd24ffa1d-5896-4cfc-904b-ecdff5748bf8' @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @rutaFactura: $'''''' @rutaNotaFabricante: pdfFiles.FullName @contadorPosicion: 1 @cargarFactura: $'''False'''
 ELSE
 NEXT LOOP
 END
 END
 IF NotContains(rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada, $'''.pdf''', True) THEN
 SET rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada TO rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada + '.pdf'
 END
 WAIT (File.WaitForFile.Created File: rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada)
 Folder.Move Folder: folder Destination: configData['rutaProcesados'] MovedFolder=> movedFolder
 Text.Replace Text: rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada TextToFind: $'''Input''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''Input\\Procesados''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Cerrar Sesión'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'f6e81cd1-2780-4ae7-a951-763cf8793a78'
 IF Contains(datosCliente[0]['Razón Social'], $'''Finning''', False) THEN
 Email.SendEmail.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: configData['mailRobot'] Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: configData['mailRobot'] SenderDisplayName: $'''Robot Minería''' SendTo: configData['mailDestinatarioFinalFinning'] CC: configData['mailCCDestinatarioFinal'] Subject: configData['asuntoMailFinalización'] Body: cuerpoMail IsBodyHtml: True Attachments: rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 ELSE
 Email.SendEmail.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: configData['mailRobot'] Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: configData['mailRobot'] SenderDisplayName: $'''Robot Minería''' SendTo: configData['mailDestinatarioFinalOtros'] CC: configData['mailCCDestinatarioFinal'] Subject: configData['asuntoMailFinalización'] Body: cuerpoMail IsBodyHtml: True Attachments: rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 END
 END
END
FUNCTION Generar_Reporte GLOBAL
 IF (File.IfFile.DoesNotExist File: reportName) THEN
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: configData['rutaDatosMineria'] Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> excelInstance
 Excel.SaveExcel.SaveAs Instance: excelInstance DocumentFormat: Excel.ExcelFormat.FromExtension DocumentPath: $'''C:\\Users\\Karina Gabanzo\\Documents\\Proyectos\\Interlog\\Reportes\\Reporte Mineria 20210718.xlsx'''
 Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: excelInstance
 END
 SET reportName TO configData['rutaCarpetaReportes'] + 'Reporte Mineria 20210718.xlsx'
 IF (File.IfFile.Exists File: reportName) THEN
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: reportName Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> excelInstance
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Leer_ConfigFile GLOBAL
 @@flowname: 'Excel - Generar Custom Object'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5a1c1f68-927f-4fbb-80a8-7c3e28f831e7' @configFilePath: configFilePath @startColumn: $'''A''' @startRow: 1 @endColumn: $'''B''' @includeColumns: $'''True''' @configData=> tempConfig
 Variables.ConvertJsonToCustomObject Json: tempConfig CustomObject=> configData
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_Datos_ItemsMercaderia GLOBAL
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: inputFileName Visible: True ReadOnly: True LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> excelInstance
 Excel.GetFirstFreeRowOnColumn Instance: excelInstance Column: configData['columnaInicialDatos'] FirstFreeRowOnColumn=> firstFreeRowOnColumn
 Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstance StartColumn: configData['columnaInicialDatos'] StartRow: 1 EndColumn: configData['columnaFinalDatos'] EndRow: firstFreeRowOnColumn - 1 ReadAsText: True FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> inputItemData
 Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: excelInstance
 Database.Connect ConnectionString: $'''Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0;Data Source=%inputFileName%;Extended Properties=\"Excel 12.0 Xml;HDR=YES\";''' Connection=> SQLConnection
 Database.ExecuteSqlStatement.Execute Connection: SQLConnection Statement: $'''SELECT SUM([Datos Minería$].[FOB Total]) AS [Total] FROM [Datos Minería$]''' Timeout: 30 Result=> querySumFOBTotal
 Database.Close Connection: SQLConnection
 SET textValorTotalMercaderia TO querySumFOBTotal[0]['Total']
 IF Contains(textValorTotalMercaderia, $''',''', False) THEN
 Text.ParseText.RegexParseForFirstOccurrence Text: textValorTotalMercaderia TextToFind: $'''\\d+[,]\\d{1,2}''' StartingPosition: 0 IgnoreCase: False OccurrencePosition=> position Match=> textValorTotalMercaderia
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_Datos_ClienteGenerales GLOBAL
 @@flowname: 'Excel - Generar Custom Object'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5a1c1f68-927f-4fbb-80a8-7c3e28f831e7' @configFilePath: inputFileName @startColumn: $'''A''' @startRow: 1 @endColumn: $'''B''' @includeColumns: $'''False''' @configData=> datosGenerales
 Variables.ConvertJsonToCustomObject Json: datosGenerales CustomObject=> inputDatosGenerales
 Database.Connect ConnectionString: $'''Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0;Data Source=%configData['rutaBaseClientes']%;Extended Properties=\"Excel 12.0 Xml;HDR=YES\";''' Connection=> SQLConnection
 Database.ExecuteSqlStatement.Execute Connection: SQLConnection Statement: $'''SELECT * FROM [Base_Clientes$]
WHERE [Base_Clientes$].[CUIT] = %inputDatosGenerales['CUIT']%''' Timeout: 30 Result=> datosCliente
 Database.Close Connection: SQLConnection
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Ingresar_Datos_Generales GLOBAL
 IF datosCliente[0]['Tipo de Actividad'] = $'''Minera''' THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Datos Minería'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5518ff8b-b5bf-49a4-b520-7400581bc218' @tramiteName: configData['nombreTramite'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @RUMP: datosCliente[0]['RUMP'] @clientName: datosCliente[0]['Razón Social'] @typeOfActivity: datosCliente[0]['Tipo de Actividad'] @inscriptionNumber: datosCliente[0]['Nro Inscripción'] @clientCUIT: datosCliente[0]['CUIT'] @integracionRegional: $'''No'''
 ELSE
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Datos Minería'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5518ff8b-b5bf-49a4-b520-7400581bc218' @tramiteName: configData['nombreTramite'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @RUMP: datosCliente[0]['RUMP'] @clientName: datosCliente[0]['Razón Social'] @typeOfActivity: datosCliente[0]['Tipo de Actividad'] @inscriptionNumber: datosCliente[0]['Nro Inscripción'] @clientCUIT: datosCliente[0]['CUIT'] @integracionRegional: $'''No'''
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Agregar_Item GLOBAL
 WebAutomation.GetDetailsOfElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Span Items Mercadería'] AttributeName: $'''Id''' AttributeValue=> AttributeValue
 ON ERROR REPEAT 5 TIMES WAIT 2
 END
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Añadir Item Mercadería']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Añadir Item Mercadería']
 WebAutomation.Click.Click BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Añadir Item Mercadería'] MouseClick: False
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Ingresar_Datos_ItemsMercaderia GLOBAL
 @@flowname: 'Excel - Generar Custom Object'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5a1c1f68-927f-4fbb-80a8-7c3e28f831e7' @configFilePath: configData['rutaDatosMineria'] @startColumn: $'''A''' @startRow: 1 @endColumn: $'''B''' @includeColumns: $'''False''' @configData=> datosGenerales
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Datos Minería'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '5518ff8b-b5bf-49a4-b520-7400581bc218' @tramiteName: $'''Importación por régimen inversiones mineras''' @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @inputDatosGenerales: datosGenerales @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @RUMP: $'''RL-2017-11061921-MP''' @clientName: $'''MINERA EXAR SA''' @typeOfActivity: $'''Minera''' @inscriptionNumber: 11 @clientCUIT: 30618725320 @integracionRegional: $'''No'''
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Ingresar_Datos_Item GLOBAL
 Text.GetSubtext.GetSubtextFromStartTo Text: currentItem['NCM'] NumberOfChars: 10 Subtext=> codigoArancelario
 Text.Replace Text: currentItem['Cantidad'] TextToFind: $''',''' IsRegEx: True IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''%''%''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> cantidad
 Text.Replace Text: cantidad TextToFind: $'''.''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''%''%''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> cantidad
 Text.Replace Text: currentItem['FOB Unitario'] TextToFind: $'''.''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''%''%''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> valorUnitario
 Text.Replace Text: currentItem['FOB Total'] TextToFind: $'''.''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''%''%''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> valorTotal
 IF currentItem['Descripción'].Length > 245 THEN
 Text.GetSubtext.GetSubtextFromStartTo Text: currentItem['Descripción'] NumberOfChars: 245 Subtext=> descripcion
 ELSE
 SET descripcion TO currentItem['Descripción']
 END
 IF itemsCounter = 0 THEN
 @@flowname: 'Declaración Jurada - Cargar Datos Mercadería'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '280e711c-bf59-411a-b4e6-b984a0161f9f' @idCantidad: $'''numdec_cantidad''' @idUnidad: $'''cmb_unidad_medida''' @idNumeroParte: $'''txt_codigo_de_parte''' @idDescripcion: $'''txt_descripcion_del_bien''' @idMarca: $'''txt_marca''' @idModelo: $'''txt_modelo''' @idCodigoUnico: $'''txt_codigo_fabricante''' @idPais: $'''cmb_pais_origen''' @idValorUnitario: $'''numdec_valor_unitario''' @idValorTotal: $'''numdec_valor_total_fob''' @idCodigoArancelario: $'''sep_codigo_arancelario''' @cantidad: cantidad @unidadMedida: currentItem['Unidad de Medida'] @numeroParte: currentItem['Número de Parte'] @codigoArancelario: codigoArancelario @descripcionDelBien: descripcion @marca: currentItem['Marca'] @modelo: currentItem['Modelo'] @codigoFabricante: currentItem['Código Fabricante'] @paisOrigen: currentItem['País TAD'] @valorUnitario: valorUnitario @valorTotal: valorTotal @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot']
 ELSE
 LABEL Continuar_Carga_Items
 IF itemsLimit < 50 THEN
 CALL Agregar_Item
 SET idCantidad TO configData['cantidad'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idUnidad TO configData['unidadMedida'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idNumeroParte TO configData['numeroParte'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idCodigoArancelario TO configData['codigoArancelario'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idDescripcion TO configData['descripciónDelBien'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idMarca TO configData['marca'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idModelo TO configData['modelo'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idCodigoFabricante TO configData['codigoUnico'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idPais TO configData['paisOrigen'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idValorUnitario TO configData['valorUnitario'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 SET idValorTotal TO configData['valorTotal'] + '_R' + itemsCounter
 # ------------------------------------- Inicio --------------------------------------------
 @@flowname: 'Declaración Jurada - Cargar Datos Mercadería'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '280e711c-bf59-411a-b4e6-b984a0161f9f' @idCantidad: idCantidad @idUnidad: idUnidad @idNumeroParte: idNumeroParte @idDescripcion: idDescripcion @idMarca: idMarca @idModelo: idModelo @idCodigoUnico: idCodigoFabricante @idPais: idPais @idValorUnitario: idValorUnitario @idValorTotal: idValorTotal @idCodigoArancelario: idCodigoArancelario @cantidad: cantidad @unidadMedida: currentItem['Unidad de Medida'] @numeroParte: currentItem['Número de Parte'] @codigoArancelario: codigoArancelario @descripcionDelBien: descripcion @marca: currentItem['Marca'] @modelo: currentItem['Modelo'] @codigoFabricante: currentItem['Código Fabricante'] @paisOrigen: currentItem['País TAD'] @valorUnitario: valorUnitario @valorTotal: valorTotal @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot']
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: itemsLimit IncrementValue: 1
 ELSE
 SET itemsLimit TO 1
 CALL Ingresar_Datos_Adicionales
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Modificar']) FOR 60
 CALL Recuperar_Tramite
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Modificar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Modificar']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Modificar']
 WAIT 5
 GOTO Continuar_Carga_Items
 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Ingresar_Datos_Adicionales GLOBAL
 SET observaciones TO 'Número Factura: ' + inputDatosGenerales['Nro Factura']
 IF inputDatosGenerales['Expedientes Escalonados'] = $'''Si''' THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga Datos Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '98dbe781-2bfd-4ca3-9d3c-30af208056c4' @valorTotalMercaderia: textValorTotalMercaderia @observacionesNroFactura: observaciones @expedientesEscalonados: inputDatosGenerales['Expedientes Escalonados'] @fechaNotificacion: inputDatosGenerales['Fecha Notificación'] @prorroga: inputDatosGenerales['Prórroga'] @prorrogaExtraordinaria: inputDatosGenerales['Prórroga Extraordinaria'] @proveedor: inputDatosGenerales['Proveedor'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @rutaDeclaracionJurada: rutaDeclaracionJurada @fileFullName=> rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 ELSE IF inputDatosGenerales['Expedientes Escalonados'] = $'''No''' THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Carga Datos Adicionales'
External.RunFlow FlowId: '98dbe781-2bfd-4ca3-9d3c-30af208056c4' @valorTotalMercaderia: textValorTotalMercaderia @observacionesNroFactura: observaciones @expedientesEscalonados: inputDatosGenerales['Expedientes Escalonados'] @fechaNotificacion: $'''''' @prorroga: $'''''' @prorrogaExtraordinaria: $'''''' @proveedor: inputDatosGenerales['Proveedor'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @rutaDeclaracionJurada: rutaDeclaracionJurada @fileFullName=> rutaDeclaracionJuradaDescargada
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Web_CerrarSesion GLOBAL
 IF reintentos = 5 THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Cerrar Sesión'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'f6e81cd1-2780-4ae7-a951-763cf8793a78'
 EXIT Code: 0 ErrorMessage: $'''Se alcanzó el máximo de reintentos para cargar los datos generales.'''
 ELSE
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Cerrar Sesión'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'f6e81cd1-2780-4ae7-a951-763cf8793a78'
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Recuperar_Tramite GLOBAL
 CALL Web_CerrarSesion
 WAIT 1
 CALL Web_IniciarSesion
 CALL Seleccionar_Cliente
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Menu Mis Trámites']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Menu Mis Trámites']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Menu Mis Trámites']
 ON ERROR REPEAT 1 TIMES WAIT 2
 END
 WAIT 5
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Label Borradores']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Label Borradores']
 WAIT 3
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Dropdown Opciones']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Dropdown Opciones']
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Botón Continuar Trámite']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... isTramites\'']['Botón Continuar Trámite']
 WAIT 5
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Continuar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Continuar']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Ventana Seleccion de Opciones']) FOR 60
 SWITCH inputDatosGenerales['Tipo de Bien']
 CASE = $'''Reacondicionado'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton BIENES REACONDICIONADOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES REACONDICIONADOS']) FOR 60
 CASE = $'''Nuevo'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton BIENES NUEVOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES NUEVOS']) FOR 60
 CASE = $'''Usado'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES USADOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES USADOS']) FOR 60
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Web_IniciarSesion GLOBAL
 IF Contains(datosCliente[0]['Razón Social'], $'''Finning''', False) THEN
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Iniciar Sesión'
DISABLE External.RunFlow FlowId: 'bdabf5fb-301e-4a31-bcc3-b21f0fd280dc' @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: $'''mjoeok@gmail.com''' @CUITCUIL: 20957335323 @PasswordCUITCUIL: P''
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Iniciar Sesión'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'bdabf5fb-301e-4a31-bcc3-b21f0fd280dc' @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @CUITCUIL: 23241709809 @PasswordCUITCUIL: P''
 ELSE
 @@flowname: 'Trámites a Distancia - Iniciar Sesión'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'bdabf5fb-301e-4a31-bcc3-b21f0fd280dc' @urlTramitesaDistancia: configData['tramitesDistanciaURL'] @ConfigMailPath: configData['rutaConfigMail'] @EmailFrom: configData['mailRobot'] @CUITCUIL: otrosClientesCUITCUIL @PasswordCUITCUIL: otrosClientesPassword
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Enviar_Mail_Error GLOBAL
 CALL Extraer_ConfigMail
 LOOP FOREACH EmailCurrentData IN ConfigMail
 IF EmailCurrentData['ID'] = EmailIndex THEN
 Email.SendEmail.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: configData['mailRobot'] Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: configData['mailRobot'] SenderDisplayName: $'''Robot Minería''' SendTo: EmailCurrentData['To'] Subject: EmailCurrentData['Subject'] Body: EmailCurrentData['Body'] IsBodyHtml: False
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_ConfigMail GLOBAL
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: ConfigData['rutaConfigMail'] Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> ExcelInstance
 Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstance StartColumn: 1 StartRow: 1 EndColumn: 4 EndRow: 6 ReadAsText: True FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> ConfigMail
 Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: ExcelInstance
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Seleccionar_Cliente GLOBAL
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> chromeInstance
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Cliente'] Text: datosCliente[0]['Razón Social'] EmulateTyping: False UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Cliente']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: chromeInstance Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Label Resultado Cliente']
 WAIT 3
END FUNCTION
"

Workflow.Name: Trámites a Distancia - Guardar Expediente
Workflow.Definition:
"@INPUT rutaDeclaracionJurada : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'rutaDeclaracionJurada', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@OUTPUT fileFullName : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'fileFullName' } 
WebAutomation.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> browser
WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']) FOR 200
WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']
WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... e=21709826\'']['Label Expediente Declaración Jurada']
WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Ventana \"Save As\"']) FOR 60
WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo']) FOR 60
UIAutomation.DataExtraction.GetElementDetails Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo'] AttributeName: $'''Own Text''' AttributeValue=> fileName
WAIT 1
Text.Replace Text: rutaDeclaracionJurada TextToFind: $'''RE''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: fileName ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> fileFullName
UIAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField TextField: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo'] Text: fileFullName Mode: UIAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace ClickType: UIAutomation.PopulateMouseClickType.SingleClick
WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Botón Guardar']) FOR 60
UIAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton Button: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Botón Guardar']"

Workflow.Name: Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Datos Minería
Workflow.Inputs: {"schema":{"required":["tramiteName","ConfigMailPath","EmailFrom","inputDatosGenerales","urlTramitesaDistancia","RUMP","clientName","typeOfActivity","inscriptionNumber","clientCUIT","integracionRegional"],"properties":{"tramiteName":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"tramiteName","type":"string","value":"Importación por régimen inversiones mineras"},"ConfigMailPath":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"ConfigMailPath","type":"string","value":"C:\\AppMineria\\Config\\Configmail Carga de Mineria.xlsx"},"EmailFrom":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"EmailFrom","type":"string","value":"karinagabanzo@gmail.com"},"inputDatosGenerales":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"inputDatosGenerales","type":"string","value":"{ 'Tipo de Bien': 'Usados', 'Web_URL': '0'}"},"urlTramitesaDistancia":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"urlTramitesaDistancia","type":"string","value":"https://tramitesadistancia.gob.ar/tramitesadistancia/inicio-publico"},"RUMP":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"RUMP","type":"string","value":"RL-2017-11061921-MP"},"clientName":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"clientName","type":"string","value":"MINERA EXAR SA"},"typeOfActivity":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"typeOfActivity","type":"string","value":"Minera"},"inscriptionNumber":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"inscriptionNumber","type":"string","value":"11"},"clientCUIT":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"clientCUIT","type":"string","value":""},"integracionRegional":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"integracionRegional","type":"string","value":"No"}},"type":"object"}}
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
@INPUT tramiteName : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'tramiteName', 'DefaultValue': 'Importación por régimen inversiones mineras', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT ConfigMailPath : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'ConfigMailPath', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\AppMineria\\Config\\Configmail Carga de Mineria.xlsx', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT EmailFrom : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'EmailFrom', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': 'karinagabanzo@gmail.com' } 
@INPUT inputDatosGenerales : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'inputDatosGenerales', 'DefaultValue': '{ \'Tipo de Bien\': \'Usados\', \'Web_URL\': \'0\'}', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT urlTramitesaDistancia : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'urlTramitesaDistancia', 'DefaultValue': 'https://tramitesadistancia.gob.ar/tramitesadistancia/inicio-publico', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT RUMP : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'RUMP', 'DefaultValue': 'RL-2017-11061921-MP', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT clientName : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'clientName', 'DefaultValue': 'MINERA EXAR SA', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT typeOfActivity : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'typeOfActivity', 'DefaultValue': 'Minera', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT inscriptionNumber : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'inscriptionNumber', 'DefaultValue': '11', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT clientCUIT : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'clientCUIT', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '' } 
@INPUT integracionRegional : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'integracionRegional', 'DefaultValue': 'No', 'Type': 'String' } 
Variables.ConvertJsonToCustomObject Json: inputDatosGenerales CustomObject=> datosGenerales
CALL Iniciar_Tramite
CALL Ingresar_Datos_de_Solicitud
CALL Declaracion_Jurada_Datos_Generales
FUNCTION Ingresar_Datos_de_Solicitud GLOBAL
 BLOCK IngresarDatos
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 4
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
END
 SWITCH datosGenerales['Tipo de Bien']
 CASE = $'''Reacondicionado'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton BIENES REACONDICIONADOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES REACONDICIONADOS']) FOR 60
 CASE = $'''Nuevo'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton BIENES NUEVOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES NUEVOS']) FOR 60
 CASE = $'''Usado'''
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES USADOS']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check BIENES USADOS']) FOR 60
 END
 Text.SplitText.SplitWithDelimiter Text: RUMP CustomDelimiter: $'''-''' IsRegEx: False Result=> rumpCodes
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Completar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Completar']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Primer Campo RUMP']) FOR 100
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Primer Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Primer Campo RUMP'] Text: rumpCodes[0] EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Primer Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Primer Campo RUMP']
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Segundo Campo RUMP']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Segundo Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Segundo Campo RUMP'] Text: rumpCodes[1] EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Segundo Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Segundo Campo RUMP']
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Tercer Campo RUMP']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Tercer Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Tercer Campo RUMP'] Text: rumpCodes[2] EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Tercer Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Tercer Campo RUMP']
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Cuarto Campo RUMP']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Cuarto Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Cuarto Campo RUMP'] Text: rumpCodes[3] EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Cuarto Campo RUMP']
 WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Input Cuarto Campo RUMP']
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1 Y: 1 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.CurrentMousePosition MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Guardar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Guardar']
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Declaracion_Jurada_Datos_Generales GLOBAL
 BLOCK Declaracion_Jurada
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 5
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
END
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Declaración Jurada COMPLETAR']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Declaración Jurada COMPLETAR']
 WAIT 1
 IF typeOfActivity = $'''Minera''' THEN
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check Actividad Minera']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.SetCheckboxState.SetCheckboxState BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check Actividad Minera'] State: WebAutomation.CheckboxState.Checked
 ELSE
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check Actividad de Servicios']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.SetCheckboxState.SetCheckboxState BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Check Actividad de Servicios'] State: WebAutomation.CheckboxState.Checked
 END

 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Enviar_Mail GLOBAL
 CALL Extraer_ConfigMail
 LOOP FOREACH EmailCurrentData IN ConfigMail
 IF EmailCurrentData['ID'] = EmailIndex THEN
 Email.SendEmail.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: EmailFrom Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: EmailFrom SenderDisplayName: $'''RPA_Minería''' SendTo: EmailCurrentData['To'] Subject: EmailCurrentData['Subject'] Body: EmailCurrentData['Body'] IsBodyHtml: False
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_ConfigMail GLOBAL
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: ConfigMailPath Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> ExcelInstance
 Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstance StartColumn: 1 StartRow: 1 EndColumn: 4 EndRow: 4 ReadAsText: True FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> ConfigMail
 Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: ExcelInstance
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Iniciar_Tramite GLOBAL
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> Browser
 ON ERROR REPEAT 1 TIMES WAIT 1
 ON ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 2
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
 END
 BLOCK IniciarTramite
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 3
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
END
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Dropdown Cliente a Representar']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Cliente'] Text: clientName EmulateTyping: False UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Cliente']
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Label Resultado Cliente']
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Página Iniciar Trámite']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Buscar Trámite']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Input Buscar Trámite'] Text: tramiteName EmulateTyping: False UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Label Nombre Trámite']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Iniciar Trámite']['Boton Iniciar Trámite']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Label Titulo Importación por Régimen']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Continuar']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Continuar']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Ventana Seleccion de Opciones']) FOR 60
 END
END FUNCTION
"

Workflow.Name: Excel - Generar Custom Object
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
@INPUT configFilePath : { 'Description': 'Config File Path', 'FriendlyName': 'configFilePath', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\PUBLIC\\Carga de Minería\\Input\\Template MAR00704 - MTP044393\\Template - 722090 - MTP044393.xlsm', 'Type': 'String' } 
@OUTPUT configData : { 'Description': 'Config data as custom object.', 'FriendlyName': 'configData' } 
@INPUT startColumn : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'startColumn', 'DefaultValue': 'A', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT startRow : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'startRow', 'DefaultValue': '1', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT endColumn : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'endColumn', 'DefaultValue': 'B', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT includeColumns : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'includeColumns', 'DefaultValue': 'True', 'Type': 'String' } 
@@flowname: 'Extraer Datos Excel'
External.RunFlow FlowId: 'b9ef586c-6672-4424-b68a-a4205a399d8d' @fileName: configFilePath @startColumn: $'''A''' @startRow: 1 @endColumn: $'''B''' @includeColumns: $'''True''' @fileData=> configFileData
Text.SplitText.SplitWithDelimiter Text: configFileData CustomDelimiter: $'''\\n''' IsRegEx: True Result=> configFileList
SET tempCustomObject TO $'''$'''
SET lengthTotal TO 0
LOOP FOREACH configRow IN configFileList
 IF IsEmpty(configRow) THEN
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 Text.SplitText.SplitWithDelimiter Text: configRow CustomDelimiter: $''',''' IsRegEx: False Result=> configVariables
 IF configVariables.Count > 2 THEN
 SET value TO $'''%' '%'''
 LOOP loopString FROM 1 TO configVariables.Count - 1 STEP 1
 SET value TO value + ',' + configVariables[loopString]
 END
 SET lengthVariable TO configVariables[0].Length
 Text.GetSubtext.GetSubtextFrom Text: value CharacterPosition: 2 Subtext=> value
 Text.Trim Text: value TrimOption: Text.TrimOption.Both TrimmedText=> value
 SET value TO value + '\''
 SET itemLength TO lengthVariable + value.Length + 2
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: lengthTotal IncrementValue: itemLength + 6
 Text.Pad Text: tempCustomObject PadPosition: Text.PadPosition.Right PaddingText: $'''%PaddedText%, \'%configVariables[0]%\': \'%value%\'''' TotalLength: lengthTotal PaddedText=> PaddedText
 ELSE
 Text.Trim Text: configRow TrimOption: Text.TrimOption.Both TrimmedText=> value
 Text.Trim Text: configVariables[1] TrimOption: Text.TrimOption.Both TrimmedText=> value
 SET itemLength TO configVariables[0].Length + value.Length
 DISABLE SET itemLength TO configRow.Length
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: lengthTotal IncrementValue: itemLength + 9
 Text.Pad Text: tempCustomObject PadPosition: Text.PadPosition.Right PaddingText: $'''%PaddedText%, \'%configVariables[0]%\': \'%value%\'''' TotalLength: lengthTotal PaddedText=> PaddedText
 END
END
Text.Replace Text: PaddedText TextToFind: $'''\\$+[,]''' IsRegEx: True IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''{''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> tempCustomObject
SET lengthTotal TO tempCustomObject.Length + 2
Text.Pad Text: tempCustomObject PadPosition: Text.PadPosition.Right PaddingText: $''' }''' TotalLength: lengthTotal PaddedText=> customObject
Text.Replace Text: customObject TextToFind: $'''\\''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''\\\\''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> customObject
SET configData TO customObject
FUNCTION Build_CustomObject GLOBAL
 Text.SplitText.SplitWithDelimiter Text: configFileData CustomDelimiter: $'''\\n''' IsRegEx: True Result=> configFileList
 SET tempCustomObject TO $'''$'''
 SET lengthTotal TO 0
 LOOP FOREACH configRow IN configFileList
 IF IsEmpty(configRow) THEN
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 Text.SplitText.SplitWithDelimiter Text: configRow CustomDelimiter: $''', ''' IsRegEx: False Result=> configVariables
 SET itemLength TO configRow.Length
 Variables.IncreaseVariable Value: lengthTotal IncrementValue: itemLength + 6
 Text.Trim Text: configVariables[1] TrimOption: Text.TrimOption.Both TrimmedText=> value
 Text.Pad Text: tempCustomObject PadPosition: Text.PadPosition.Right PaddingText: $'''%PaddedText%, \'%configVariables[0]%\': \'%value%\'''' TotalLength: lengthTotal PaddedText=> PaddedText
 END
 Text.Replace Text: PaddedText TextToFind: $'''\\$+[,]''' IsRegEx: True IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''{''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> tempCustomObject
 SET lengthTotal TO tempCustomObject.Length + 2
 Text.Pad Text: tempCustomObject PadPosition: Text.PadPosition.Right PaddingText: $''' }''' TotalLength: lengthTotal PaddedText=> customObject
 Text.Replace Text: customObject TextToFind: $'''\\''' IsRegEx: False IgnoreCase: False ReplaceWith: $'''\\\\''' ActivateEscapeSequences: False Result=> customObject
 Variables.ConvertJsonToCustomObject Json: customObject CustomObject=> configData
END FUNCTION
"

Workflow.Name: Trámites a Distancia - Iniciar Sesión
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: [PasswordCUITCUIL]
@INPUT urlTramitesaDistancia : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'urlTramitesaDistancia', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': 'https://tramitesadistancia.gob.ar/tramitesadistancia/inicio-publico' } 
@INPUT ConfigMailPath : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'ConfigMailPath', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\Users\\KG\\Downloads\\Config\\Configmail Carga de Mineria.xlsx' } 
@INPUT EmailFrom : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'EmailFrom', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': 'karinagabanzo@gmail.com' } 
@INPUT CUITCUIL : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'CUITCUIL', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '' } 
@INPUT PasswordCUITCUIL : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'PasswordCUITCUIL', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '' } 
BLOCK IniciarConexion
ON BLOCK ERROR
 SET ContadorExcepciones TO ContadorExcepciones + 1
 CALL Cerrar_Sesion
 CALL Cerrar_Explorador
 REPEAT BLOCK
END
 IF ContadorExcepciones = 3 THEN
 SET EmailIndex TO 3
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 EXIT Code: 0 ErrorMessage: $'''\"Se agotaron los reintentos para iniciar sesión\"'''
 END
 IF (System.IfProcess.ProcessIsRunning ProcessName: $'''chrome''') THEN
 System.TerminateProcess.TerminateProcessByName ProcessName: $'''chrome'''
 END
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.LaunchChrome Url: urlTramitesaDistancia WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Maximized ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
 ON ERROR REPEAT 1 TIMES WAIT 1
 ON ERROR
 SET EmailIndex TO 2
 CALL Enviar_Mail
 THROW ERROR
 END
 CALL Reiniciar_Pagina
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Ventana Principal']['Página Principal']) FOR 60
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Ventana Principal']['Boton AFIP']) FOR 60
 WAIT 2
 MouseAndKeyboard.MoveMouse X: 1300 Y: 500 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Ventana Principal']['Boton AFIP']
 ON ERROR REPEAT 2 TIMES WAIT 5
 ON ERROR ElementNotFoundError
 CALL Reiniciar_Pagina
 THROW ERROR
 ON ERROR PressButtonError
 CALL Reiniciar_Pagina
 THROW ERROR
 END
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP']['Ventana Acceso Con Clave Fiscal']) FOR 60
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP']['Ventana Acceso Con Clave Fiscal']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP']['Input CUIT/CUIL']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP']['Input CUIT/CUIL'] Text: CUITCUIL EmulateTyping: False UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP']['Boton Siguiente']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP Contraseña']['Input Password']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP Contraseña']['Input Password']
 WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP Contraseña']['Input Password'] Text: PasswordCUITCUIL EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Ingreso AFIP Contraseña']['Boton Ingresar']
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina principal']['Edit Buscar trámite']) FOR 60
END
FUNCTION Enviar_Mail GLOBAL
 CALL Extraer_ConfigMail
 LOOP FOREACH EmailCurrentData IN ConfigMail
 IF EmailCurrentData['ID'] = EmailIndex THEN
 Email.SendEmail.AuthenticateAndSend SMTPServer: $'''smtp.gmail.com''' Port: 465 EnableSSL: True Username: EmailFrom Password: P'' AcceptUntrustedCertificates: False SendFrom: EmailFrom SenderDisplayName: $'''RPA_Minería''' SendTo: EmailCurrentData['To'] Subject: EmailCurrentData['Subject'] Body: EmailCurrentData['Body'] IsBodyHtml: False
 EXIT LOOP
 END
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Extraer_ConfigMail GLOBAL
 Excel.LaunchExcel.LaunchAndOpen Path: ConfigMailPath Visible: True ReadOnly: False LoadAddInsAndMacros: False Instance=> ExcelInstance
 Excel.ReadFromExcel.ReadCells Instance: ExcelInstance StartColumn: 1 StartRow: 1 EndColumn: 4 EndRow: 4 ReadAsText: True FirstLineIsHeader: True RangeValue=> ConfigMail
 Excel.CloseExcel.Close Instance: ExcelInstance
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Cerrar_Explorador GLOBAL
 WebAutomation.CloseWebBrowser BrowserInstance: Browser
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Reiniciar_Pagina GLOBAL
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WaitForWindowContent.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Chrome']['Boton Refrescar']) FOR 60
 UIAutomation.PressButton Button: appmask['Ventana Chrome']['Boton Refrescar']
 ON ERROR REPEAT 1 TIMES WAIT 5
 END
END FUNCTION
FUNCTION Cerrar_Sesion GLOBAL
 BLOCK Cerrar_Sesion
ON BLOCK ERROR
 CALL Cerrar_Explorador
END
 WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> browser
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Nombre de Usuario']) FOR 120
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Nombre de Usuario']
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Salir'])
 WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Salir']
 WAIT 1
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WaitForWebPageContent.WebPageToNotContainElement BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen'])
 END
END FUNCTION
"

Workflow.Name: Declaración Jurada - Cargar Datos Mercadería
Trámites a Distancia - Carga de Reportes Adicionales
Workflow.Definition:
"@INPUT inputDatosGenerales : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'inputDatosGenerales', 'DefaultValue': '', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT rutaFactura : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'rutaFactura', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\Users\\Karina Gabanzo\\Documents\\Proyectos\\Interlog\\Input\\Factura 721556\\FACTURA 721556.pdf', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT rutaNotaFabricante : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'rutaNotaFabricante', 'DefaultValue': 'C:\\Users\\Karina Gabanzo\\Documents\\Proyectos\\Interlog\\Input\\Factura 721556\\DDJJ 721556.pdf', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT contadorPosicion : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'contadorPosicion', 'DefaultValue': '1', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT cargarFactura : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'cargarFactura', 'DefaultValue': 'True', 'Type': 'String' } 
WebAutomation.AttachToChromeByTitle TabTitle: $'''Mis Trámites - Trámites a Distancia''' BrowserInstance=> browser
Variables.ConvertJsonToCustomObject Json: inputDatosGenerales CustomObject=> datosGenerales
IF cargarFactura = $'''True''' THEN
 SET rutaDocumentoAdjunto TO rutaFactura
 SWITCH datosGenerales['Tipo de Bien']
 CASE = $'''Reacondicionado'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Reacondicionados']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Reacondicionados']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Facturas Reacondicionados']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 CASE = $'''Nuevo'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Nuevo']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Nuevo']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Facturas Nuevo']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 CASE = $'''Usado'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Usados']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Facturas Usados']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Facturas Usados']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 END
ELSE IF cargarFactura = $'''False''' THEN
 SET rutaDocumentoAdjunto TO rutaNotaFabricante
 SWITCH datosGenerales['Tipo de Bien']
 CASE = $'''Reacondicionado'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Reacondicionados']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Reacondicionados']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Nota del Fabricante Reacondicionados']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 CASE = $'''Nuevo'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Nuevo']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Nuevo']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Nota del Fabricante Nuevo']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 CASE = $'''Usado'''
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Usados']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Nota del Fabricante Usados']
 CALL Carga_Documento_Adjunto
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Botón Ver Nota del Fabricante Usados']) FOR 60
 WAIT 5
 END
END
FUNCTION Carga_Documento_Adjunto GLOBAL
 WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Ventana Subir Informacion']) FOR 60
 DISABLE WAIT (WebAutomation.WebPageToContainElement BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Adjuntar de PC']) FOR 60
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.Focus BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Adjuntar de PC']
 WebAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Adjuntar de PC']
 DISABLE WebAutomation.HoverOverElement BrowserInstance: browser Control: appmask['Pagina Importación por Régimen']['Boton Adjuntar de PC']
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Enter}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.Click ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.DoubleClick MillisecondsDelay: 0
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Ventana Carga de Documentos']) FOR 60
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo']) FOR 60
 UIAutomation.FormFilling.PopulateTextField TextField: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Input Ruta Archivo'] Text: rutaDocumentoAdjunto Mode: UIAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace ClickType: UIAutomation.PopulateMouseClickType.SingleClick
 WAIT 2
 WAIT (UIAutomation.WindowToContainElement Element: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Boton Open']) FOR 60
 UIAutomation.FormFilling.PressButton Button: appmask['Ventana Carga de Documentos']['Boton Open']
END FUNCTION"
